text: <@U02F8TTPU>: (and <@U026PHQ3J>) I just shared with you a link Justin sent over. It's a video of an animation that they want to get our thoughts on to see if we could build this and have it show instead of the flappy android loader animation
I've let them know we'll chat on Monday about feasibility and follow up but wanted to send it to you now to get it on your radar

I can def ask Justin for a gif
(the loading animation is in the webview, because it seemed to make sense when we're loading content into a webview)
